members.name: data
members.description:
interface MenuItemData {
  label: string;
  keybinding?: string;
  value?: string;
  separator?: boolean;
  tabindex?: number;
}

attributes.name: data
attributes.description:
interface MenuItemData {
  label: string;
  keybinding?: string;
  value?: string;
  separator?: boolean;
  tabindex?: number;
}
The sizes are borrowed from the VSCode settings page. The narrow size is typically used for the numeric values and the wide size for the text.

members.name: columnLabel
members.description: Cell label in the compact view of the responsive mode. For internal use only.

members.name: compact
members.description: Enable compact view in the responsive mode. For internal use only.

attributes.name: columnLabel
attributes.description: Cell label in the compact view of the responsive mode. For internal use only.

attributes.name: compact
attributes.description: Enable compact view in the responsive mode. For internal use only.

members.name: columns
members.description:
Initial column sizes in a JSON-encoded array.
Accepted values are:
- number
- string-type number (ex.: "100")
- px value (ex.: "100px")
- percentage value (ex.: "50%")
- percentage value (ex.: "50%")
- "auto" keyword

members.name: minColumnWidth
members.description:
Minimum column width. Valid values are:
- number
- string-type number (ex.: "100")
- px value (ex.: "100px")
- percentage value (ex.: "50%")
- percentage value (ex.: "50%")
- "auto" keyword

members.name: _sashHovers
members.description: Sash hover state flags, used in the render.

members.name: _headerCells
members.description:
Cached querySelectorAll result. Updated when the header slot changes.
It shouldn't be used directly, check the "_getHeaderCells" function.

members.name: _cellsOfFirstRow
members.description:
Cached querySelectorAll result. Updated when the body slot changes.
It shouldn't be used directly, check the "_getCellsOfFirstRow" function.

members.name: _getCellsOfFirstRow
members.description: Get cached cells of first row

attributes.name: columns

Initial column sizes in a JSON-encoded array.
Accepted values are:

- px value (ex.: "100px")

- "auto" keyword

attributes.name: min-column-width
attributes.description:
Minimum column width. Valid values are:
- number
- string-type number (ex.: "100")
- px value (ex.: "100px")
- percentage value (ex.: "50%")
- percentage value (ex.: "50%")
- "auto" keyword
